data.text: @hesh_brown @lSuper_ Regardless its a chrctr that has already been a villian beaten by a lower lvl SSJ who's now stronger than the guy who kicked the 💩 out the highest lvl SSJ which is Blue and stood toe to toe with Ultra Instinct Omen & Complete. It's just all wrong...

@lSuper_ @Malik29430198 Ok, well sleep on it. Only 3 of my chrctrs loadouts have 4000 def. Majority of my main chrctr loadouts are roughly 3300, 3200, 3700, 1700 stat wise. Join a koth with us & just checkout what we do. It's just so fun bro + u get to use ur favorite legendary gears.

@RayBill2 @Malik29430198 sorry man not my thing anymore with the ones i run into its 5500 defense and i have to hit them 3x the amount to even take the normal health. i also don't want to get characters to level 30 to get max stats i can get. not fun for me

@lSuper_ @Malik29430198 They set these gimics and boost one stat category to like 3800. Oh forgot the Akimbo Blaze from redhood but yea no real worries in gear matches. I play there everyday with my friends who aren't crazy with stats. Send me a dm and I'll send you my gamertag so u can see "IT'S FUN"

@lSuper_ @Malik29430198 On XboxOne it's more gimic plyrs in conjunction with gear stats. Like Catcall, Hypnotic, Joker Infection, Reverse Omega Beams, Fear Gas, Air Ice Clone, Air Ground Sparks, Air Devils Revolver, Amon Rah MB, Mikey Low Spin (6 hits not 3). If u can navigate these there are no worries

@lSuper_ @Malik29430198 I totally understand & to be 100% honest there aren't many that play with really crazy gear stats anymore. There are 3 batman plyrs with 4900, 5200, 5400, & 6162 def. The 4900 guy has skill but the others just try to spam dual batarangs and run away.

@RayBill2 @Malik29430198 thanks for the tip but i stopped getting the legendary gear because i can't have fun playing them with the stupid idea they had to add even more gear stats to what was already the worst thing about the game lol
@lSuper_ @Malik29430198 With this set up I chewed right through the Legendary Multiverses...

@lSuper_ @Malik29430198 Super get a Hori Turbo Controller & USB Adapter (pic below). You can set it to grind the endless tower while you sleep, cooking, go to the store, go to the bathroom, etc. There are a few things u'll eventually have to do but for the most part the AI does about 70% of the work. https://t.co/aCKto66v5d

@Malik29430198 @lSuper_ Enchantress Legendary Gear makes her curses stronger, revives her demon trait quicker, & any of her curses inflict damage over the duration of the curse. Similar to Cheetahs Legendary Gear, after so many scratches you bleed out health for a period of time.

@Malik29430198 @lSuper_ Rare Legendary Loadouts.Collected all 41 back in the 2nd week of July. First on Xbox One & First overall, only 3 ppl total have all 41. The other two are on PS4 @Nyeem78 https://t.co/W0TALQihVe

@lSuper_ Now Jiren for as strong as he appeared is now seemingly humanized compared to this New Broly. Nevertheless Beerus is on the cusp of being surpassed as well. What next Whis, The Grand Priest & Omni Kings get surpassed to? C'mon enough is enough

@lSuper_ DBZ continues to make most recent SSJ transfornations more & more irrelevant. SSJ, SSJ2, SS3, SS4, SSG, SSB, SSBKaioken (goku), SSUltraB (vegeta), Ultra Instinct Omen, Ultra Instinct Complete, so many of these great forms (SS4 #1) are forgotten or just thrown to the waste side

@lSuper_ DBZ is getting so inconsistant as far as the chrctr power ups. How can a Broly already beaten by a SS2 Goku "with help" be stronger than a SSB Goku, Jiren or Beerus? SSB is 4 lvls above SS2 which was enough to beat Bezerker Broly the first time.

@lSuper_ Have a hybrid of Vegetas Super Saiyan Blue Evolved and Goku Ultra Instinct Omen, Half Dark Blue half Silver with the UI Aura and Dark Blue Lightning Aura for Gogeta as he defeats Broly. It would be dope.
@lSuper_ What? Make Soul Punisher canon wym lol
@lSuper_ I have WiFi. Just not Xbox live. So I need Xbox live to do it. Cause if that was the case I wouldn’t of gotten the Superman legendary gear.
@Malik29430198 they changed it so you have to be online to get legendary gear a few months ago

@Undead_Pumpkin i think blue gogeta would be enough considering how much stronger goku and vegeta are no compared to the start of the tournament of power but it would be awesome to see mastered UI return, maybe gogeta time runs out and then mastered UI happens

@lSuper_ I can’t go to online because I have no Xbox live. And Xbox live is not the case because I acquired Superman’s legendary gear without a problem. But this just so happens when I get Enchantress’s gear. WHY ME😩
@Malik29430198 go to online that connects to the server

@lSuper_ Hey Lsuper, another thing is do you know how to connect to the Injustice2 server, cause every time I try to do Enchantress’s last legendary multiverse it always pops up YOU ARE NOT CONNECTED TO THE INJUSTICE SERVER😡. Can u help me out or do you know how to fix this.
@lSuper_ YOU ARE NOT CONNECTED TO THE INJUSTICE 2 SERVER!😡Can someone PLEASE HELP ME‼️
@lSuper_ Okay man. I understand 😪.
@Cassius335 that would be so sick
@Malik29430198 sorry but i can't stand playing with gear stats on so its no worth me doing all that grinding. rather put my time into practicing dragon ball combos etc.
@lSuper_ Given it's a DBS movie, I'm amazed there's no rumour of a Broly/Jiren fight...

@Trippieekai they already gave me broly and he's going to be even stronger than jiren and maybe beerus... i'm a happy man lol as long as they don't one punch him like the original movie i'm cool with what ever they do

@lSuper_ Super, can u acquire more legendary gear in injustice 2. I know you said you hate just pushing a button all day but, I think you should collect them all. I’m collecting them all and I really want to see what Enchantress’s gear does. Please acquire more legendary gear. For ME😉🙏
